Medias.Title: Fast & Furious 7
Medias.Synopsis: Deckard Shaw seeks revenge against Dominic Toretto and his family for his comatose brother.

Medias.Title: The Walking Dead
Medias.Synopsis: Sheriff's Deputy Rick Grimes leads a group of survivors in a world overrun by zombies.

Medias.Title: Spectre
Medias.Synopsis: A cryptic message from Bond's past sends him on a trail to uncover a sinister organization. While M battles political forces to keep the secret service alive, Bond peels back the layers of deceit to reveal the terrible truth behind SPECTRE.

Medias.Title: Cendrillon
Medias.Synopsis: When her father unexpectedly passes away, young Ella finds herself at the mercy of her cruel stepmother and her daughters. Never one to give up hope, Ella's fortunes begin to change after meeting a dashing stranger.

Medias.Title: Game of Thrones
Medias.Synopsis: Several noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros.

Medias.Title: Avengers: L'ère d'Ultron
Medias.Synopsis: When Tony Stark tries to jumpstart a dormant peacekeeping program, things go awry and it is up to the Avengers to stop the villainous Ultron from enacting his terrible plans.

Medias.Title: Divergente 2: L'insurrection
Medias.Synopsis: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

Medias.Title: Interstellar
Medias.Synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

Medias.Title: Home
Medias.Synopsis: Oh, an alien on the run from his own people, lands on Earth and makes friends with the adventurous Tip, who is on a quest of her own.

Medias.Title: Get Hard
Medias.Synopsis: When millionaire James King is jailed for fraud and bound for San Quentin, he turns to Darnell Lewis to prep him to go behind bars.

Medias.Title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
Medias.Synopsis: Director : Zack Snyder

Medias.Title: The Flash
Medias.Synopsis: Barry Allen wakes up 9 months after he was struck by lightning and discovers that the bolt gave him the power of super speed. With his new team and powers, Barry becomes "The Flash" and fights crime in Central City.

Medias.Title: It Follows
Medias.Synopsis: A young woman is followed by an unknown supernatural force after getting involved in a sexual encounter.

Medias.Title: Arrow
Medias.Synopsis: Spoiled billionaire playboy Oliver Queen is missing and presumed dead when his yacht is lost at sea. He returns five years later a changed man, determined to clean up the city as a hooded vigilante armed with a bow.

Medias.Title: Vikings
Medias.Synopsis: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok: the greatest hero of his age. The series tells the saga of Ragnar's...

Medias.Title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Medias.Synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic world, in which people fight to the death, Max teams up with a mysterious woman, Furiousa, to try and survive.

Medias.Title: Fear the Walking Dead
Medias.Synopsis: What did the world look like as it was transforming into the horrifying apocalypse depicted in "The Walking Dead"? This spin-off set in Los Angeles, following new characters as they face the beginning of the end of the world, will answer that question.

Medias.Title: Bloodline
Medias.Synopsis: A family of adult siblings find that their past secrets and scars are revealed when their black sheep of a brother returns home.

Medias.Title: Better Call Saul
Medias.Synopsis: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer, Saul Goodman, in the time leading up to establishing his strip-mall law office in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

Medias.Title: Once Upon a Time
Medias.Synopsis: A woman with a troubled past is drawn to a town in Maine where fairy tales are to be believed.

Medias.Title: Kingsman: Services secrets
Medias.Synopsis: A spy organization recruits an unrefined, but promising street kid into the agency's ultra-competitive training program, just as a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

Medias.Title: Cinquante nuances de Grey
Medias.Synopsis: Literature student Anastasia Steele's life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

Medias.Title: Into the Woods: Promenons-nous dans les bois
Medias.Synopsis: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

Medias.Title: House of Cards
Medias.Synopsis: A Congressman works with his equally conniving wife to exact revenge on the people who betrayed him.

Medias.Title: Southpaw
Medias.Synopsis: A boxer fights his way to the top, only to find his life falling apart around him.

Medias.Title: Diversion
Medias.Synopsis: In the midst of veteran con man Nicky's latest scheme, a woman from his past - now an accomplished femme fatale - shows up and throws his plans for a loop.

Medias.Title: Jurassic World
Medias.Synopsis: Twenty-two years after the events of Jurassic Park, Isla Nublar now features a fully functioning dinosaur theme park, Jurassic World, as originally envisioned by John Hammond. After 10 years of operation and visitor rates declining, in order to fulfill a corporate mandate, a new attraction is created to re-spark visitor's interest, which backfires horribly.

Medias.Title: Divergente
Medias.Synopsis: In a world divided by factions based on virtues, Tris learns she's Divergent and won't fit in. When she discovers a plot to destroy Divergents, Tris and the mysterious Four must find out what makes Divergents dangerous before it's too late.

Medias.Title: The Big Bang Theory
Medias.Synopsis: A woman who moves into an apartment across the hall from two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside of the laboratory.

Medias.Title: Imitation Game
Medias.Synopsis: During World War II, mathematician Alan Turing tries to crack the enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians.

Medias.Title: The Last Man on Earth
Medias.Synopsis: THE LAST MAN ON EARTH is a new single-camera comedy about the life and adventures of the last man on earth...

Medias.Title: Supernatural
Medias.Synopsis: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as "hunters" fighting evil supernatural beings of many kinds including monsters, demons, and gods that roam the earth.

Medias.Title: Breaking Bad
Medias.Synopsis: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with a terminal lung cancer, teams up with his former student, Jesse Pinkman, to cook and sell crystal meth.

Medias.Title: iZombie
Medias.Synopsis: A medical resident finds that being a zombie has its perks, which she uses to assist the police.

Medias.Title: Grey's Anatomy
Medias.Synopsis: A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.

Medias.Title: Mad Men
Medias.Synopsis: A drama about one of New York's most prestigious ad agencies at the beginning of the 1960s, focusing on one of the firm's most mysterious but extremely talented ad executives, Donald Draper.

Medias.Title: Pretty Little Liars
Medias.Synopsis: Four friends band together against an anonymous foe who threatens to reveal their darkest secrets, while unraveling the mystery of the murder of their best friend.

Medias.Title: Les Gardiens de la Galaxie
Medias.Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.

Medias.Title: Fast & Furious 6
Medias.Synopsis: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets convoluted also facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

Medias.Title: Les nouveaux héros
Medias.Synopsis: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

Medias.Title: The 100
Medias.Synopsis: Set 97 years after a nuclear war has destroyed civilization, when a spaceship housing humanity's lone survivors sends 100 juvenile delinquents back to Earth in hopes of possibly re-populating the planet.

Medias.Title: Marvel: Les agents du S.H.I.E.L.D.
Medias.Synopsis: The missions of the Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division.

Medias.Title: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
Medias.Synopsis: A woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and starts life over again in New York City.

Medias.Title: The DUFF
Medias.Synopsis: A high school senior instigates a social pecking order revolution after finding out that she has been labeled the DUFF - Designated Ugly Fat Friend - by her prettier, more popular counterparts.

Medias.Title: Shameless
Medias.Synopsis: An alcoholic man lives in a perpetual stupor while his six children with whom he lives cope as best they can.

Medias.Title: Star Wars: Episode VII - Le Réveil de la Force
Medias.Synopsis: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas set thirty years after Le retour du Jedi.

Medias.Title: The Blacklist
Medias.Synopsis: A highly articulate, erudite and intelligent businessman and mastermind, "Red" Reddington, has allegedly...

Medias.Title: American Horror Story
Medias.Synopsis: An anthology series that centers on different characters and locations, including a haunted house, an insane asylum, a witch coven, a freak show and a hotel.

Medias.Title: Black Sails
Medias.Synopsis: Captain Flint and his pirates, twenty years prior to Robert Louis Stevenson's classic "Treasure Island".

Medias.Title: Birdman
Medias.Synopsis: A washed-up actor, who once played an iconic superhero, battles his ego and attempts to recover his family, his career and himself in the days leading up to the opening of his Broadway play.

Medias.Title: Whiplash
Medias.Synopsis: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Medias.Title: Vampire Diaries
Medias.Synopsis: A teenage girl is torn between two vampire brothers.

Medias.Title: Exodus
Medias.Synopsis: The defiant leader Moses rises up against the Egyptian Pharaoh Ramses, setting 600,000 slaves on a monumental journey of escape from Egypt and its terrifying cycle of deadly plagues.

Medias.Title: Le septième fils
Medias.Synopsis: Young Thomas is apprenticed to the local Spook to learn to fight evil spirits. His first great challenge comes when the powerful Mother Malkin escapes her confinement while the Spook is away.

Medias.Title: Gotham
Medias.Synopsis: The story behind Commissioner James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival.

Medias.Title: Gone Girl
Medias.Synopsis: With his wife's disappearance having become the focus of an intense media circus, a man sees the spotlight turned on him when it's suspected that he may not be innocent.

Medias.Title: Le Hobbit: La bataille des cinq armées
Medias.Synopsis: Bilbo and Company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness.

Medias.Title: Invincible
Medias.Synopsis: After a near-fatal plane crash in WWII, Olympian Louis Zamperini spends a harrowing 47 days in a raft with two fellow crewmen before he's caught by the Japanese navy and sent to a prisoner-of-war camp.

Medias.Title: Ex Machina
Medias.Synopsis: A young programmer is selected to participate in a breakthrough experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breathtaking female A.I.

Medias.Title: Hunger Games: La révolte - 1ère partie
Medias.Synopsis: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

Medias.Title: The D Train
Medias.Synopsis: The head of a high school reunion committee travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion.

Medias.Title: Masterminds
Medias.Synopsis: A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history.

Medias.Title: Spy
Medias.Synopsis: A desk-bound CIA analyst volunteers to go undercover to infiltrate the world of a deadly arms dealer, and prevent diabolical global disaster.

Medias.Title: The Following
Medias.Synopsis: A brilliant and charismatic, yet psychotic serial killer communicates with other active serial killers and activates a cult of believers following his every command.

Medias.Title: Superfast!
Medias.Synopsis: Undercover cop Lucas White joins Vin Serento's LA gang of illegal street racers. They are fast and they are furious and they plan to double cross LA crime kingpin Juan Carlos de la Sol who hides his cash in a downtown Taco Bell. The gangs outrageous plan is as daring as it is ridiculous and will see them towing the whole damn restaurant, at crazy speeds.

Medias.Title: Friends
Medias.Synopsis: Follows the lives of six 20-something friends living in Manhattan.

Medias.Title: Chappie
Medias.Synopsis: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

Medias.Title: Kidnapping Mr. Heineken
Medias.Synopsis: The inside story of the planning, execution, rousing aftermath and ultimate downfall of the kidnappers of beer tycoon Alfred "Freddy" Heineken, which resulted in the largest ransom ever paid for an individual.

Medias.Title: The Longest Ride
Medias.Synopsis: After an automobile crash, the lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

Medias.Title: Straight Outta Compton
Medias.Synopsis: The group NWA emerges from the streets of Compton, California in the mid-1980s and revolutionizes pop culture with their music and tales about life in the hood.

Medias.Title: Suits, avocats sur mesure
Medias.Synopsis: On the run from a drug deal gone bad, Mike Ross, a brilliant college-dropout, finds himself a job working with Harvey Specter, one of New York City's best lawyers.

Medias.Title: La promesse d'une vie
Medias.Synopsis: An Australian man travels to Turkey after the Battle of Gallipoli to try and locate his three missing sons.

Medias.Title: Fast and Furious
Medias.Synopsis: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

Medias.Title: Modern Family
Medias.Synopsis: Three different, but related families face trials and tribulations in their own uniquely comedic ways.

Medias.Title: Empire
Medias.Synopsis: A father, who has a successful music business, has to choose one of his three sons to take over when he dies.

Medias.Title: Orange Is the New Black
Medias.Synopsis: The story of Piper Chapman, a woman in her thirties who is sentenced to fifteen months in prison after being convicted of a decade-old crime of transporting money for her drug-dealing girlfriend.

Medias.Title: Fantastic Four
Medias.Synopsis: Four young scientists achieve superhuman abilities through a teleportation experiment gone haywire. They must now use these abilities to save the world from an uprising tyrant.

Medias.Title: Poltergeist
Medias.Synopsis: A family's suburban home is invaded by evil forces.

Medias.Title: Une merveilleuse histoire du temps
Medias.Synopsis: A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

Medias.Title: Bates Motel
Medias.Synopsis: "Bates Motel" is a contemporary prequel to the genre-defining film "Psycho," and gives a portrayal of...

Medias.Title: Esprits criminels
Medias.Synopsis: The cases of the BAU, an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous criminal minds in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again.

Medias.Title: Kill Me Three Times
Medias.Synopsis: Professional hit-man Charlie Wolfe finds himself in three tales of murder, blackmail and revenge after a botched contract assignment.

Medias.Title: Bob l'éponge, le film: Un héros sort de l'eau
Medias.Synopsis: When a diabolical pirate above the sea steals the secret Krabby Patty formula, SpongeBob and his nemesis Plankton must team up in order to get it back.

Medias.Title: The Forger
Medias.Synopsis: A thief (John Travolta) works with his father (Christopher Plummer) and son to forge a painting by Monet and steal the original. Together, they plan the heist of their lives.

Medias.Title: Night Run
Medias.Synopsis: Mobster and hit man Jimmy Conlon has one night to figure out where his loyalties lie: with his estranged son, Mike, whose life is in danger, or his longtime best friend, mob boss Shawn Maguire, who wants Mike to pay for the death of his own son.

Medias.Title: Daredevil
Medias.Synopsis: A blind lawyer with his other senses superhumanly enhanced fights crime as a costumed superhero.

Medias.Title: A Most Violent Year
Medias.Synopsis: In New York City 1981, an ambitious immigrant fights to protect his business and family during the most dangerous year in the city's history.

Medias.Title: True Detective
Medias.Synopsis: An anthology police detective series in which investigations seem to unearth both personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within or outside the law.

Medias.Title: The Royals
Medias.Synopsis: Drama about a fictional British Royal family set in modern day London, who inhabit a world of opulence...

Medias.Title: Wild
Medias.Synopsis: A chronicle of one woman's 1,100-mile solo hike undertaken as a way to recover from a recent catastrophe.

Medias.Title: Revenge
Medias.Synopsis: An emotionally troubled young woman makes it her mission to exact revenge against the people who wronged her father.

Medias.Title: Night Call
Medias.Synopsis: When Lou Bloom, a driven man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story. Aiding him in his effort is Nina, a TV-news veteran.

Medias.Title: Dope
Medias.Synopsis: A coming of age comedy/drama for the post hip hop generation. Malcolm is a geek, carefully surviving life in The Bottoms...

Medias.Title: Deadpool
Medias.Synopsis: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers and adopts the alter ego Deadpool.

Medias.Title: Mission Impossible 5
Medias.Synopsis: Ethan and team take on their most impossible mission yet, eradicating the Syndicate - an International rogue organization as highly skilled as they are, committed to destroying the IMF.

Medias.Title: Sherlock
Medias.Synopsis: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

Medias.Title: Justified
Medias.Synopsis: Old-school U.S. Marshal Raylan Givens is reassigned from Miami to his childhood home in the poor, rural coal-mining towns in Eastern Kentucky.
